bill_title: revise the state trunk highway system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the state trunk highway system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 31-4-136 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-136. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Hughes and Brookings counties: (1) From a point on State Highway 34 in the southeast quarter of section three, township one hundred ten north, range seventy-nine west U.S. Highway 14 easterly to State Highway 34 , thence north via Pierre to U.S. Highway 14 near the southeast corner of section twenty-two, township one hundred eleven north, range seventy-nine west ; (2) From a point on U.S. Highway 14 near the northwest corner of section twenty-two, township one hundred ten north, range fifty west of Brookings , thence easterly via Brookings to U.S. Highway 14 near the southeast corner of section twenty, township one hundred ten north, range forty-nine west east of Brookings . Section 2. That § 31-4-156 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-156. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Butte, Lawrence, Meade, Ziebach, Haakon, Stanley, Hughes, Hyde, Buffalo, Jerauld, Sanborn, Miner, Lake, and Moody counties: (1) From a point on the Wyoming state line north of the southwest corner of section nineteen, township eight north, range one east, thence southeasterly to Interstate Highway 90 in section twenty-one, township six north, range four east ; (2) From a point on Interstate Highway 90 near the southeast corner of section five, township five north, range five east, thence easterly via Sturgis to U.S. Highway 14 at Kellar's Corner east of the northwest corner of section twenty-nine, township five north, range twenty-five east ; (3) From a point on U.S. Highway 14 14B in Pierre near the northeast corner of section five, township one hundred ten north, range seventy-nine west , thence easterly via Pierre, Wessington Springs, Lane, Woonsocket, Artesian, Roswell, Vilas and Howard to U.S. Highway 81 east of Howard near the northeast corner of section eleven, township one hundred six north, range fifty-five west ; (4) From a point on U.S. Highway 81 at Madison near the northwest corner of section seven, township one hundred six north, range fifty-two west, thence easterly via Madison, Colman, and Egan to the Minnesota state line near the south quarter corner of section three, township one hundred six north, range forty-seven west . Section 3. That § 31-4-178 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-178. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Fall River, Custer, Pennington, Meade, Butte, and Harding counties: (1) From a point on U.S. Highway 18 southeast of Hot Springs in section thirty-four, township seven south, range six east, thence northerly via Rapid City to the intersection of U.S. Highway 16B , and from the intersection at State Highway 44 west and northerly to Interstate Highway 90 ; (2) From a point on State Highway 34 east of Sturgis near the south quarter corner of section six, township five north, range six east, thence north to U.S. Highway 212 south of Newell west of the southeast corner of section six, township eight north, range six east ; (3) From a point on U.S. Highway 212 in Newell near the southwest corner of section twenty, township nine north, range six east, thence northerly to State Highway 20 near the northwest corner of section twelve, township eighteen north, range eight east ; (4) From a point on State Highway 20 east of Buffalo in section ten, township eighteen north, range nine east, thence north to the North Dakota state line east of the northwest corner of section twenty-four, township twenty-three north, range nine east . Section 4. That § 31-4-240 be repealed. 31-4-240. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Pennington County: From a point on State Highway 238 east of Rapid City east of the northwest corner of section nine, township one north, range eight east, thence northeasterly and north to Interstate Highway 90 on the east line of section twenty-eight, township two north, range eight east.
